data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Ganjam, Odisha, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ganjam, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 38,819 believers in the county of Ganjam to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Ganjam, Odisha, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 38,819 believers in Ganjam, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Ganjam, Odisha, India.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 3,529,000 people living in Ganjam through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.section_summary:
the county of Ganjam, Odisha, India has a population of 3,529,000.

We estimate Ganjam has 38,819 people who might know Jesus, 42,818 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,447,363 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Ganjam access to a Bible in their own language.
